member.name: T:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.ContactCallActivatedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data when an app is activated to call a contact.

member.summary: Gets the contact for the call.
member.returns: The contact for the call.

member.summary: Gets the activation type.
member.returns: The ActivationKind.Contact enumeration value.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.ContactCallActivatedEventArgs.PreviousExecutionState
member.summary: Gets the execution state of the app before it was activated.
member.returns: A ApplicationExecutionState -typed value.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.ContactCallActivatedEventArgs.ServiceId
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the service used for the call.
member.returns: The identifier of the service used for the call.

member.summary: Gets the user identifier of the service used for the call.
member.returns: The user identifier of the service used for the call.

member.name: P:Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.ContactCallActivatedEventArgs.SplashScreen
member.summary: Gets the splash screen object, which provides information about the transition from the splash screen to the activated app.
member.returns: The object that provides splash screen information.

member.summary: Gets the action to be performed.
member.returns: The action to be performed.
